name: A Dusty Tunnel
description:
You are standing in dust.  This place has not been touched for a long time. 
Otherwise it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest!  To the west
you see the outline of a door.  A tunnel leads to the east.

exits.description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards.  It is quite dark.
You can see the outline of a door.  Just like in the description!
exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 7324 S #7326 The Crossing~    You are standing in a crossing of hallways.  You can leave this place in every direction, except up and down.  In the dust you notice strange footprints.

extra_descriptions.description: You have never seen this kind of footprint before!
